resp.brief_description: Reporting and processing disconnection/connection times with minute accuracy to Datahub.
Development needed for metering data reminders to avoid incorrect reminders.

resp.feature_name: New attribute for exact disconnection/connection time
resp.brief_description: A new attribute is needed to handle the exact disconnection/connection time.

resp.feature_name: Disconnection/connection times reported with minute accuracy
resp.brief_description: Disconnection/connection times are reported to Datahub with minute accuracy.

resp.feature_name: Balance agreement situation at the beginning of the time step
resp.brief_description: The party whose balance the consumption goes to is determined according to the balance agreement situation at the beginning of the time step (15 min or 1 h).

resp.feature_name: Balance agreement ends at the end of the time step
resp.brief_description: The balance agreement remains valid until the end of the disconnection time step (15 min/1 h) at the moment of disconnection.

resp.feature_name: Balance agreement created from the beginning of the connection time step
resp.brief_description: The balance agreement is created from the beginning of the connection time step.

resp.feature_name: Status of the point of use handled similarly to the balance agreement
resp.brief_description: The status of the point of use is handled similarly to the balance agreement.

resp.feature_name: Disconnection time corresponds to the actual situation
resp.brief_description: The disconnection time in the system data corresponds to the actual situation.

resp.feature_name: Handling of disconnection and connection in the same 15 min period
resp.brief_description: Special rules for handling disconnection and connection in the same 15 min period to avoid overlap in balance agreements.

resp.feature_name: Handling of disconnection and connection in the same hour
resp.brief_description: Special rules for handling disconnection and connection in the same hour to avoid overlap in balance agreements.
